title: PHP 5.4 and -INF comparisons with assertSame() / assertNotSame()
body:
`assertEquals()` is broken for `-INF` comparisons on PHP 5.4.

```
âžœ  phpunit git:(3.6) phpunit
PHPUnit @package_version@ by Sebastian Bergmann.

Failed asserting that -INF is identical to -INF.
```
